com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions

Interface ExoplayerWrapper.InternalErrorListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ExoplayerWrapper

    public static interface ExoplayerWrapper.InternalErrorListener
    A listener for internal errors.

    These errors are not visible to the user, and hence this listener is provided for informational purposes only. Note however that an internal error may cause a fatal error if the player fails to recover. If this happens, ExoplayerWrapper.PlaybackListener.onError(Exception) will be invoked.

    Implementing an ExoplayerWrapper.InternalErrorListener is a good way to identify why ExoPlayer may be behaving in an undesired way.
